name: Dodge the Creeps! (nosepoke)
description:
I've done a few game jams before, but this was the first one in which I developed something on my own!

I've never worked with Godot before and I'm not a programmer, so I relied almost entirely on the documentation. I created this by following the tutorial in the Getting Started: Step by step section of Godot Docs.

Most of the game assets are from the tutorial. Find the files by going to the section titled  "Your first game". You'll find a link to download a zip file with the art and "game over" sound.

I subbed some of the sound files for ones I found on Freesound.org:

  • Menu Hum: Paranormal Activity Sound by MeijstroAudio
  • Music: Ambient Loops IV LOOPA by goredon
